app.title: Mahmoud Salah - Full Stack Developer
app.description: Personal portfolio of Mahmoud Salah, a Full Stack Developer

hero.title: Mahmoud
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I build exceptional digital experiences with modern web technologies. Focused on creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. I love turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient, and scalable code.
about.description2: With experience in modern JavaScript frameworks and a keen eye for design, I create applications that are not only functional but also provide an exceptional user experience.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product management, cart, and payment integration.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: A personal portfolio website built with Nuxt.js and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: A weather application that displays current and forecasted weather data.

items.title: Recipe Finder
items.description: Find recipes based on ingredients you have at home.

items.title: Blog Platform
items.description: A full-stack blog platform with user authentication and rich text editing.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? Feel free to reach out and let's create something amazing together!
contact.infoDescription: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision.

success.title: Message Sent
success.message: Thank you for reaching out! I will get back to you soon.
